methods.name: aiStep
javadoc: Called frequently so the entity can update its state every tick as required. For example, zombies and skeletons use this to react to sunlight and start to burn.

methods.name: hurt
javadoc: Called when the entity is attacked.

methods.name: sendMessage
javadoc: Send a chat message to the CommandSender

methods.name: shouldRenderAtSqrDistance
javadoc: Checks if the entity is in range to render.

methods.name: tick
javadoc: Called to update the entity's position/logic.
